price: (33) Who feared the Most Merciful in the unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
